title: AI-Driven Personalized Learning Design for Strengthening Social Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational social science knowledge
context.additional_context: Utilizing learner-customized AI systems to strengthen corporate social sector job competencies

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in social sector practical competencies (data analysis, collaboration, decision-making) using AI-based learning systems.
Customized learning pathways are designed by subdividing competencies into three or more levels based on individual diagnostic results.
Weekly learning outcomes are measured and feedback is provided through formative assessments (quizzes, assignments, peer evaluations).
Learners conduct three or more knowledge-sharing and collaborative projects using digital learning tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
